name: UIEvent

properties.name: captures
properties.description: True if this event can be captured.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.description: True if the event is of a type that bubbles.

properties.name: cancelable
properties.description: True if the default action associated with the event can be canceled with preventDefault().

properties.name: currentTarget
properties.description: The event target object which is currently handling the event. During capturing and bubbling, this is different from the property target.

properties.name: eventPhase
properties.description: The current phase of event propagation; one of none, target, capture, bubble.

properties.name: target
properties.description: The event target object for this event.

properties.name: timeStamp
properties.description: The date and time at which the event occurred.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The name of the event that this  object represents.

properties.name: view
properties.description: The ScriptUI element that this event relates to.

properties.name: detail
properties.description: The click count for a mouse-click event.

methods.name: preventDefault
methods.description: Prevents the default action associated with this event from being called.

methods.name: stopPropagation
methods.description: Stops the propagation of this event.

methods.name: initEvent
methods.description: Initializes a UI event as a core W3C event.

parameters.description: Set to true if this event can be captured.
parameters.name: captures

parameters.description: Set to true if the event bubbles.
parameters.name: bubbles

parameters.description: Set to true if the default action is cancelable.
parameters.name: cancelable

parameters.description: Set to true if this event can be captured.
parameters.name: captures

parameters.description: Set to true if the event bubbles.
parameters.name: bubbles
view
parameters.description: The ScriptUI element that this event relates to.

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: The click count for a mouse-click event.

description: Encapsulates input event information for an event that propagates through a container and control hierarchy.
